title: Marx on the Individual Part 1/2 | Weekend Podcast #25
description:
Hugo and Josh discuss Marx's view of the individual in the context of his time, as well as his view on human nature and selfishness.

You can find the reading lists of each individual podcast episode on our website: 
https://www.lotuseaters.com/category/podcast
